TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1044
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Peter and Joseph Powell, No date [01-18-1834]

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Peter and Joseph Powell, Monterey, January 18, 1834. Asking them to deliver two miniatures of Austin to his sister.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1044

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Peter and Joseph Powell, Monterey, January 18, 1834. Asking them to deliver two miniatures of Austin to his sister.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I send two likenesses of mine which I request *person_mentioned*Mr Powell*/person_mentioned* to put into the hands of my *person_mentioned*sister */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*Brother in law Perry*/person_mentioned* Please take care of them—they are painted on ivory in water colors and wet will ruin them. *person_mentioned*Mr. Allsbury*/person_mentioned* will put them in a box and they can be put in your trunk edgewise so as not to crack the glass by any weight on it*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Peter Powell */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Joseph Powel*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Dn. H. Allsberry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Pilon*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
